articles.title: Chinese tech stocks fall as Tencent shuts game streaming site - Moneyweb
articles.description: The Hang Seng Tech Index closed down 1.2% on Friday, having earlier shed as much as 3%.
articles.content:
Chinese tech stocks slid for a third day as Tencent Holdings Ltd.s decision to shut its game streaming service further hurt sentiment in a sector already bogged down by regulatory risks.
